title: Lies, Gaffes & Rambling: Biden Proves His 2nd Amendment Ignorance | Guests: Nikki Haley & Peter Schweizer | 8/31/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden's latest anti-Second Amendment speech, which was filled with gaffes, lies, and rambling. Former U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley, founder of Stand for America, explains why she believes the leak of her organization's tax returns, with the names of donors, was an intimidation tactic. President of the Govt. Accountability Institute Peter Schweizer blasts the government's criminalization of former President Trump while ignoring the crimes of other influential politicians. Justin Haskins of the Heartland Institute exposes how public pension funds overwhelmingly support ESG causes. Author of "Fossil Future" Alex Epstein reveals how the Left manipulates people regarding fossil fuels. Glenn discusses the importance and scope of the First Amendment.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
